label: Background tension of V7 manifold
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Background tension of V7 manifold. Validation: Mass = friction against manifold
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144
watts = reg.watts_constant       # 1.618... (golden ratio)

# Higgs VEV from V7 manifold background tension
# v = roots * watts^2 / sqrt(chi)
v_higgs = roots * (watts ** 2) / (chi ** 0.5)  # ~246 GeV
verified = abs(v_higgs - 246.22) < 1.0
